subject: Tennis
New York City Marathon
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick bet Justin Gimelstob $10,000 (for charity) that he would not be able to complete the New York City Marathon in under 4 hours 45 minutes.
snippet: Andy Roddick bet Justin Gimelstob $10,000 (for charity) that he would not be able to complete the New York City Marathon in under 4 hours 45 minutes.
